extension.name: Phone Validator
extension.description: Displays phone numbers that are likely to be invalid, or that look to be incorrectly assigned as either a mobile phone number or a landline number. Allows deletion and changes to any phone number through the interface. USAGE: in the menu under 'Contacts'. v1.1 Adds a filter on different types of phone number. v1.2 Adds a filter on different types of contact.
extension.comments: TODO: 1. Change background colour if the phone number goes from being invalid to being valid. 2. Have to column to say what's wrong. 3. Suggest fixes to the values. 4. Check for duplicate entries.
